name: 芭布拉·温格德
name_full: 芭布拉·温格德 Barbra Wengerd

last_movies.title: 法律与秩序 第二十二季
联邦调查局 第四季
法律与秩序：特殊受害者 第十九季

introduction: Barbra Wengerd is an American actor born and raised just outside of Chicago. She is known primarily for her work on stage regionally and in New York. In her early life as a performer she was nationally competitive in forensics (public speaking and dramatic interpretation) for the College of DuPage and Arizona State University. After completing her undergraduate degree, she studied the Meisner Technique at the Actors' Center in Chicago, trained with Uta Hagen at the HB studio in New York, and went on to receive her MFA from the University of San Diego/The Old Globe. She has appeared in Law & Order: SVU, The Family, I Shudder, and has a leading role in the film Barren directed by Rose Haag.
